page.title: 12EARLHAM HOUSE SHPPING CENTRE
page.content: { There are many small shopping centres around{Norwich.Earlham House}is about a mile from the city centre and the shops there include a post office a bread shop an newsagents, a supermarket,a fish and chip shops and a bank. We questioned some of the shoppers and they told us they came to Earlham house because of the free car park. It is also a short walk from shops to shop and for many people the centre is quite close to their homes. We asked if they would like to see any changes or additions to shopping facilities. It seems that a clothing shop would be welcome.
